name: Bullet Joe
description:
Game Controls Left clickShoot1 (or &)
2 (or é)
3 (or ")Load "Level 1"
Load "Level 2"
Load "Level 3"EscQuit The Game

Bullet Joe is a "wario ware" type mini-game, created by 3 people with the constraint of using only one input. Once an enemy pops up, simply fire the exact same number of targets that appear above him, but be careful not to over or under shoot ! (no need to aim, just go to town with the clickity-clicks ^^)

 "When you have to shoot, shoot, don't talk." Eli Wallach
